physicalDescription.extent: 1 item (photograph), 5 x 7 inches, black and white
physicalDescription.note: Handwritten on back of photograph: ''Late 1880's, L to R, Robert Shulman, clothier, Central City, Mrs. Robert Shulman, Michael A Saly, Mrs. M. A. Saly, Rose Saly, Visitors: Iska Block, Georgetown, Julius Seidler, Central City, Sara Saly, Nettye Shulman Wolff, M. A. Saly: founder of Mt Nebo Cemetery, Mrs. Saly: founder Ladies Shroud Society, #120.''

mods.abstract: Shulman and Saly family members pose together with friends infront of a house. Back row left to right: Robert Shulman, Mrs. Robert Shulman, and Michael A Saly. Also in photograph: Mrs. M. A. Saly, Rose Saly, Iska Block, Julius Seidler, Sara Saly, and Nettye Shulman Wolff.
mods.note: Appears in ''Images of America: Jewish Denver 1859-1940,'' by Dr. Jeanne Abrams, on page 118.

titleInfo.title: Beck Archives Photograph Collection, Families and Groups
